CustomField.formula: IF( OR( VALUE(RIGHT(TEXT((SBQQ__CustomerTotal__c / (SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c * Segment_Months__c)) * 10000), 1)) > 0, VALUE(RIGHT(TEXT((SBQQ__CustomerTotal__c / (SBQQ__EffectiveQuantity__c * Segment_Months__c)) * 1000), 1)) > 0 ), TRUE, FALSE )
CustomField.label: Recurring Discount Percentage
